product_name.description: The official name of the AI product.

product_url.description: The main URL for the AI tool.

logo_img_url.description: URL of the product's logo image.

overview_img_url.description: URL of the main overview image or hero image.

short_introduction.description: A brief, concise introduction or overview of the product.

product_story.description: A longer, more detailed story or description of the product, often found in an 'About' section.

primary_task.description: The primary function or main use case of the AI tool (e.g., 'Video Editor', 'Content Writer', 'Image Generator').

author_company.description: The name of the author or company that developed the AI tool.

popularity_score.description: A numerical score indicating the tool's popularity.

general_price_tag.description: A general tag indicating the pricing model (e.g., 'Free', 'Freemium', 'Paid', 'Contact for pricing').

initial_release_date.description: The date when the product was first released.

number_of_tools_by_author.description: The total number of tools developed by the same author/company.

average_rating.description: The average user rating for the tool, typically out of 5.

rating_count.description: The total number of user ratings or reviews.

is_verified_tool.description: True if the tool is marked as 'Verified', false otherwise.

inputs.description: A list of data types or formats that the AI tool accepts as input (e.g., 'Text', 'Audio', 'Image').

outputs.description: A list of data types or formats that the AI tool generates as output (e.g., 'Video', 'Code', 'Image').

pricing_model.description: The specific pricing model (e.g., 'Subscription', 'One-time Purchase', 'Free Trial').

paid_options_from.description: The starting price for paid options.

pricing_details.description: Detailed information about the tool's pricing.

release_date.description: The date of this specific release.

release_notes.description: Notes or summary of changes for this release.

release_author.description: The author or team responsible for this release.

releases.description: A list of new versions or updates released for the product.

job_type.description: The type of job or profession impacted (e.g., 'Content Creator', 'Graphic Designer').

impact_description.description: A description of how the tool impacts this job.

tasks_affected.description: Specific tasks within the job that are affected.

ai_skills_required.description: Any AI-related skills required to use the tool effectively in this job.

job_impacts.description: Information about how the AI tool impacts various job types.

pros_list.description: A list of advantages or benefits of the AI tool.

cons_list.description: A list of disadvantages or drawbacks of the AI tool.

related_tasks.description: A list of tasks related to the tool's functionality.

name.description: The name of an alternative AI tool.

url.description: The URL of the alternative AI tool.

relationship_type.description: The type of relationship (e.g., 'Alternative', 'Most Popular Alternative', 'Featured Match').

alternative_tools.description: A list of alternative AI tools.
